data.title: HERACLES++: Multidimensional compressible hydrodynamics solver
data.name: heraclespp
data.description: HERACLES++ is a hydrodynamic code with a moving grid, designed to run on different architectures using Kokkos.

evidence: Owner is GitHub organization `Maison-de-la-Simulation`, indicating an institutional project rather than an individual maintainer.

README describes building and running an executable: "The executable can be found in the directory `build/src/heracles++`. The execution needs an input file and is done with the following command: `./build/src/heracles++ ./inputs/shock_tube.ini`", indicating end-user application software.
Citation describes it as "HERACLES++: A multidimensional Eulerian code for exascale computing", implying a scientific simulation code directly used to produce research results.
